WorkItem.Summary: Missing Shaman Glyph of Fire Nova

Comments.Message: He took it out of the program intentionally.

Why is that? I don't see a reason in the Documentation, Discussion or Issue Tracker sections of this site.

Seems like a nice glyph in high-AoE situations.

I may be completely wrong, but it is my understanding that Levva commented out this glyph in the Enhancement module because it was not playing nice with his GCD interference calcs.
However, if you are talking about the Elemental module (since you didn't specify) I don't think its modeled (since AoE isn't yet)

For some reason Rawr was modeling it as being a huge DPS, around 200 i think, been awhile. Anyways, if you simmed it in enhsim, you would see that it was really a DPS loss. Don't know why, but thats the truth of the matter.
